page.title: 03INDUSTRY GARAGE 1
page.content: {GARAGES}There are two garages.{WALTER {BRIGGS}deals in Vauxhalls,Opels and Bedfords.They also sell Shell petrol and diesel.They employ about 17 workers and have been in business for 32 years.Before selling cars the building was a bus garage and then a haulage firm.They start work at 8-0 a.m. and finish at 6-30 p.m.The cheapest new car is the Vauxhall Nova which costs about Â£3865 and the most expensive is the Opel Senator at Â£14565. The cars are delivered from Luton, Dunstable,Ellesmere Port,and from Germany,Spain and Belgium two or three times each week.Petrol comes from Liverpool and Ellesmere Port once a month,and each delivery is 3000 gallons or 15000 litres.The garage deals with customers from all around Yorkshire and Lancashire.
